verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Everybody ought to know. (2x)
Everybody ought to know who Jesus is.
He's the Healer of my body.
He's the Savior of my soul.
He's the Holy Ghost baptizer.
Everybody ought to know.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Everybody ought to know. (2x)
Everybody ought to know who Jesus is.
He's the Lily of the Valley.
He's the Bright and Morning Star.
He's the Fairest of ten thousand.
Everybody ought to know.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Everybody ought to know. (2x)
Everybody ought to know who Jesus is.
We're the members of His body.
He's the Manifested Son.
He's the Power and the Victory.
Everybody ought to know.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Everybody ought to know. (2x)
Everybody ought to know who Jesus is.
He's the Alpha and Omega.
He's the Everlasting One.
He's the Fulfillment of the promise.
Everybody ought to know.
